channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report X-2023070118
item.description:
Report X-2023070118

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-26
  • City: SACO
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: TRAILER ARRIVED FROM HUB. PACKAGE WAS TAKEN OFF TRAILER WITH A DAMAGED AND WET BOX. DescribePack: SHIPPING BOX WAS WET AND APPEARED AS ONE CAN OF ALCOHOL LEAKED DURING SHIPPING. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: AT UNLOAD, PACKAGE WAS PUT IN A DAMAGE BIN AND BROUGHT TO QA FOR INSPECTION.
